description:
When the going gets tough, the Station Short gets going. The ever-popular Station Series is designed for durability, with reinforced triple needle stitching in high-use areas and utility pockets that make it ideal for working, hiking, or adventure.

This workwear-inspired short is plenty sustainable, and the tough-but-light-on-the-planet fabric offers subtle stretch too (a bonus whether you're wearing it to work on your truck or conquer your favorite hike). So go ahead, keep one of these classic, relaxed fit shorts at the ready—it really can handle whatever you throw its way.
name: Prana Station Shorts, 11" Inseam - Mens
